Meet Kelly
Wesnyle Group

About us
Contact us

About Kelly

Helping you achieve your real estate goals is my top priority. When we work together, it is about YOU. I listen to your needs, work diligently to achieve your objectives, and strive to always exceed your expectations. As a long-term resident of Seattle and the Eastside, I am an expert.

My knowledge can help you find the right home for your now and future needs, alongside your investment goals. My central Mercer Island location is ideal for cultivating opportunities for buyers.

About me
